sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Header from "./include/nav_user"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; function Home() { const [cars, setCars] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8000/api/carData') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setCars(data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)); }, []); return (
{/ Loop through cars and display each one /} {cars.map((car) => (

{car.name}

{car.description}

))}

); } export default Home;
